"Lose Yourself" by Eminem - This intense and motivational song is all about finding your purpose and pushing yourself to be the best version of yourself.
"Roar" by Katy Perry - This song is a powerful reminder to speak up for yourself and stand up for what you believe in, even in the face of adversity.
"Brave" by Sara Bareilles - This song is a beautiful and uplifting ballad about embracing your uniqueness and finding the courage to be yourself.
"Unstoppable" by Sia - This song is all about finding the strength to keep going, even when things seem impossible or overwhelming.
"We Are the Champions" by Queen - This classic rock anthem is a triumphant celebration of success and achievement, perfect for any moment of victory or accomplishment.
